text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: VPN connectivity>
We are investigating connectivity issues for some VPN tunnels in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region. We have identified root cause and are working to resolve the issue.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: VPN connectivity>
We have restored connectivity for some of the affected VPN tunnels and are working towards full recovery.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] VPN connectivity>
We have restored connectivity for all affected VPN tunnels in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated Latency and API Error Rate>
We are investigating increased API error rates and latencies for the Amazon EC2 Container Service APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region. Container instance connectivity and running tasks are not affected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated Latency and API Error Rate>
We are investigating increased API error rates and latencies for the Amazon EC2 Container Service APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region. Container instance connectivity and running tasks are not affected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated Latency and API Error Rate>
We are investigating increased API error rates and latency for the AWS CodeBuild Service APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated Latency and API Error Rate>
We are investigating increased API error rates and latencies for the Amazon EC2 Container Service APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region and continue to work towards resolution. Container instance connectivity and running tasks are not affected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated Latency and API Error Rate>
We are investigating increased API error rates and latency for the AWS CodeBuild Service APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region and continue to work towards resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Elevated Latency and API Error Rate>
Between 4:02 PM and 5:47 PM PST we experienced elevated latency and API error rates for the Amazon EC2 Container Service APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region. Container instance connectivity and running tasks were not affected during this time. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Elevated Latency and API Error Rate>
Between 4:02 PM and 5:47 PM PST we experienced increased error rates for the AWS CodeBuild APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Elevated Latency and API Error Rate>
Between 4:02 PM and 5:47 PM PST and also between 6:08 PM and 6:27 PM PST we experienced elevated latency and API error rates for the Amazon EC2 Container Service APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region. Container instance connectivity and running tasks were not affected during this time. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Elevated Latency and API Error Rate>
Between 4:02 PM and 5:47 PM PST and also between 6:08 PM and 6:27 PM PST we experienced increased error rates for the AWS CodeBuild APIs in the US-WEST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
